GLOBAL.OUR_CULTURE_TEXT: Sinikeza indawo enobungane, ethokozisayo futhi egcwele ubumnandi. Lapho singadlali i-basketball, sijabulela iziphuzo kanye nama-braai (noma okosa inyama) noma ukuphuma kwamahhovisi, sibhekana nezinselelo ezintsha, sithuthukisa izindlela ezintsha, sixoxa ngemibono yokudala futhi siwina njengeqembu.
GLOBAL.OUR_STORY_TEXT:
Vumela kuphela wazalwa eminyakeni engaphezu kwengu-4 edlule. Ngezimpande zethu kubunjiniyela be-software sesivele ngoguquko lwedijithali futhi siyaqhubeka nokuvela. Ushintsho aluguquguquki, kepha okungakaze kushintshe indlela esisebenza ngayo nesifiso sethu sokwenza umsebenzi oncomekayo. Namuhla, sisiza amaklayenti ethu ukuthi akhuthaze ukukhula kwebhizinisi ngokusebenzisa imizwa eholelekile yomsebenzisi, ukuqamba kanye nobuchwepheshe obakhelwe ukukala.

Ulwazi lwethu lochwepheshe, isipiliyoni kanye nerekhodi elifakazelwe liyasisiza ekunikezeni umnikelo oyingqayizivele, ogxile ekusebenzeni okuhle.
GLOBAL.TECHNOLOGY_TEXT: Sakha izinhlelo zokusebenza nokuhlangenwe nakho sisebenzisa ubuchwepheshe bamuva nezinkundla
HOME.SUBTITLE: Uyayicabanga, siyayakha.
HOME.TITLE: Siletha izixazululo zedijithali
